p: The biotechnological and biomedical applications of NPs depend on their size and shape; a smaller size is better than a bigger size in applications [ 4]. In the current study, the TEM micrographs confirmed the formulation of anisotropic monodispersed bio-fabricated Ag-NPs, which were spherical and of varying sizes ranging from 7 to 15 nm ( Figure 4A). In addition, the biologically prepared nanoparticles were well dispersed without any agglomeration or disparity in their morphology. In line with our results, Hamouda et al. [ 43], who reported the bio-fabrication of stable, monodispersed Ag-NPs from the aqueous extract of cyanobacteria.
